text.title: part13_BDSM as business: Interviews with Dominatrixes

p.s: Who would n’t hurt a fly !
They can separate fantasy playing from the harsh reality of domestic dysfunction .
It ’s the same with child pornography .
Just because they have a schoolgirl fetish does n’t mean they want to actually go out there and prey upon school kids .
I think that ’s common with EVERY man ! [ Laughs ]

hi.s: Britney Spears did n’t get where she is on her singing talent .

p.s: [ Laughs ] Exactly !
I think it ’s common with every man .

That goes into another thing , because with some people it feels like you ARE sometimes making it okay for them to have these certain fantasies and some people , they know it is wrong and they would never do that , and feel it is a way to get it out .
You are always walking that line .
I think it comes down to the individual .
It ’s not the majority of people , definitely .
What it honestly is , is people using this who already have those problems , pedophiles and abusers , who use this as an outlet because they can get away with it .
And that ’s really not what we are about , either .
A lot of times we will see people like that and ban them from the dungeons .

s.hi: DS : Are there certain known people who are banned ?

p.s: Yes , it is usually people who get really obsessive and have created scenes .
Like Ernest .
He has not done anything bad , like try to beat somebody up , but he got into a screaming match with one of the phone girls about some strange detail of his visit .
People who are obviously not together .
I think he has a serious mental illness .
